ya10.3.1:1.1.pli: Yo cakkhundriyaṃ parijānāti so sotindriyaṃ parijānātīti? Āmantā.

ya10.3.1:2.1.pli: Yo vā pana sotindriyaṃ parijānāti so cakkhundriyaṃ parijānātīti? Āmantā.

ya10.3.1:3.1.pli: Yo cakkhundriyaṃ parijānāti so domanassindriyaṃ pajahatīti? No.

ya10.3.1:4.1.pli: Yo vā pana domanassindriyaṃ pajahati so cakkhundriyaṃ parijānātīti? No.

ya10.3.1:5.1.pli: Yo cakkhundriyaṃ parijānāti so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvetīti? No.

ya10.3.1:6.1.pli: Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāveti so cakkhundriyaṃ parijānātīti? No.

ya10.3.1:7.1.pli: Yo cakkhundriyaṃ parijānāti so aññindriyaṃ bhāvetīti? Āmantā.

ya10.3.1:8.1.pli: Yo vā pana aññindriyaṃ bhāveti so cakkhundriyaṃ parijānātīti?

ya10.3.1:9.1.pli: Dve puggalā aññindriyaṃ bhāventi, no ca cakkhundriyaṃ parijānanti. Aggamaggasamaṅgī aññindriyañca bhāveti cakkhundriyañca parijānāti.

ya10.3.1:10.1.pli: Yo cakkhundriyaṃ parijānāti so aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarotīti? No.

ya10.3.1:11.1.pli: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikaroti so cakkhundriyaṃ parijānātīti? No. (Cakkhundriyamūlakaṃ.)

ya10.3.1:12.1.pli: Yo domanassindriyaṃ pajahati so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvetīti? No.

ya10.3.1:13.1.pli: Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāveti so domanassindriyaṃ pajahatīti? No.

ya10.3.1:14.1.pli: Yo domanassindriyaṃ pajahati so aññindriyaṃ bhāvetīti? Āmantā.

ya10.3.1:15.1.pli: Yo vā pana aññindriyaṃ bhāveti so domanassindriyaṃ pajahatīti?

ya10.3.1:16.1.pli: Dve puggalā aññindriyaṃ bhāventi, no ca domanassindriyaṃ pajahanti. Anāgāmimaggasamaṅgī aññindriyañca bhāveti domanassindriyañca pajahati.

ya10.3.1:17.1.pli: Yo domanassindriyaṃ pajahati so aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarotīti? No.

ya10.3.1:18.1.pli: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikaroti so domanassindriyaṃ pajahatīti? No. (Domanassindriyamūlakaṃ.)

ya10.3.1:19.1.pli: Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāveti so aññindriyaṃ bhāvetīti? No.

ya10.3.1:20.1.pli: Yo vā pana aññindriyaṃ bhāveti so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvetīti? No.

ya10.3.1:21.1.pli: Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāveti so aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarotīti? No.

ya10.3.1:22.1.pli: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikaroti so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvetīti? No. (Anaññātaññassāmītindriyamūlakaṃ.)

ya10.3.1:23.1.pli: Yo aññindriyaṃ bhāveti so aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarotīti? No.

ya10.3.1:24.1.pli: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikaroti so aññindriyaṃ bhāvetīti? No. (Aññindriyamūlakaṃ.)

ya10.3.1:25.1.pli: Yo cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānāti so domanassindriyaṃ nappajahatīti?

ya10.3.1:26.1.pli: Anāgāmimaggasamaṅgī cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānāti, no ca domanassindriyaṃ nappajahati. Dve maggasamaṅgino ṭhapetvā avasesā puggalā cakkhundriyañca na parijānanti domanassindriyañca nappajahanti.

ya10.3.1:27.1.pli: Yo vā pana domanassindriyaṃ nappajahati so cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānātīti?

ya10.3.1:28.1.pli: Aggamaggasamaṅgī domanassindriyaṃ nappajahati, no ca cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānāti. Dve maggasamaṅgino ṭhapetvā avasesā puggalā domanassindriyañca nappajahanti cakkhundriyañca na parijānanti.

ya10.3.1:29.1.pli: Yo cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānāti so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvetīti?

ya10.3.1:30.1.pli: Aṭṭhamako cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānāti, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāveti. Dve maggasamaṅgino ṭhapetvā avasesā puggalā cakkhundriyañca na parijānanti anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāventi.

ya10.3.1:31.1.pli: Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāveti so cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānātīti?

ya10.3.1:32.1.pli: Aggamaggasamaṅgī anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāveti, no ca cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānāti. Dve maggasamaṅgino ṭhapetvā avasesā puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāventi cakkhundriyañca na parijānanti.

ya10.3.1:33.1.pli: Yo cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānāti so aññindriyaṃ na bhāvetīti?

ya10.3.1:34.1.pli: Dve puggalā cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānanti, no ca aññindriyaṃ na bhāventi. Tayo maggasamaṅgino ṭhapetvā avasesā puggalā cakkhundriyañca na parijānanti aññindriyañca na bhāventi.

ya10.3.1:35.1.pli: Yo vā pana aññindriyaṃ na bhāveti so cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānātīti? Āmantā.

ya10.3.1:36.1.pli: Yo cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānāti so aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarotīti?

ya10.3.1:37.1.pli: Yo aggaphalaṃ sacchikaroti so cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānāti, no ca aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikaroti. Aggamaggasamaṅgiñca arahantañca ṭhapetvā avasesā puggalā cakkhundriyañca na parijānanti aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikaronti.

ya10.3.1:38.1.pli: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikaroti so cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānātīti?

ya10.3.1:39.1.pli: Aggamaggasamaṅgī aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikaroti, no ca cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānāti. Aggamaggasamaṅgiñca arahantañca ṭhapetvā avasesā puggalā aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikaronti cakkhundriyañca na parijānanti. (Cakkhundriyamūlakaṃ.)

ya10.3.1:40.1.pli: Yo domanassindriyaṃ nappajahati so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvetīti?

ya10.3.1:41.1.pli: Aṭṭhamako domanassindriyaṃ nappajahati, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāveti. Dve maggasamaṅgino ṭhapetvā avasesā puggalā domanassindriyañca nappajahanti anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāventi.

ya10.3.1:42.1.pli: Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāveti so domanassindriyaṃ nappajahatīti?

ya10.3.1:43.1.pli: Anāgāmimaggasamaṅgī anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāveti, no ca domanassindriyaṃ nappajahati. Dve maggasamaṅgino ṭhapetvā avasesā puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāventi domanassindriyañca nappajahanti.

ya10.3.1:44.1.pli: Yo domanassindriyaṃ nappajahati so aññindriyaṃ na bhāvetīti?

ya10.3.1:45.1.pli: Dve puggalā domanassindriyaṃ nappajahanti, no ca aññindriyaṃ na bhāventi. Tayo maggasamaṅgino ṭhapetvā avasesā puggalā domanassindriyañca nappajahanti aññindriyañca na bhāventi.

ya10.3.1:46.1.pli: Yo vā pana aññindriyaṃ na bhāveti so domanassindriyaṃ nappajahatīti? Āmantā.

ya10.3.1:47.1.pli: Yo domanassindriyaṃ nappajahati so aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarotīti?

ya10.3.1:48.1.pli: Yo aggaphalaṃ sacchikaroti so domanassindriyaṃ nappajahati, no ca aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikaroti. Anāgāmimaggasamaṅgiñca arahantañca ṭhapetvā avasesā puggalā domanassindriyañca nappajahanti aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikaronti.

ya10.3.1:49.1.pli: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikaroti so domanassindriyaṃ nappajahatīti?

ya10.3.1:50.1.pli: Anāgāmimaggasamaṅgī aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikaroti, no ca domanassindriyaṃ nappajahati. Anāgāmimaggasamaṅgiñca arahantañca ṭhapetvā avasesā puggalā aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikaronti domanassindriyañca nappajahanti. (Domanassindriyamūlakaṃ.)

ya10.3.1:51.1.pli: Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāveti so aññindriyaṃ na bhāvetīti?

ya10.3.1:52.1.pli: Tayo maggasamaṅgino anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāventi, no ca aññindriyaṃ na bhāventi. Cattāro maggasamaṅgino ṭhapetvā avasesā puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāventi aññindriyañca na bhāventi.

ya10.3.1:53.1.pli: Yo vā pana aññindriyaṃ na bhāveti so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvetīti?

ya10.3.1:54.1.pli: Aṭṭhamako aññindriyaṃ na bhāveti, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāveti. Cattāro maggasamaṅgino ṭhapetvā avasesā puggalā aññindriyañca na bhāventi anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāventi.

ya10.3.1:55.1.pli: Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāveti so aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarotīti?

ya10.3.1:56.1.pli: Yo aggaphalaṃ sacchikaroti so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāveti, no ca aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikaroti. Aṭṭhamakañca arahantañca ṭhapetvā avasesā puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāventi aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikaronti.

ya10.3.1:57.1.pli: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikaroti so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvetīti?

ya10.3.1:58.1.pli: Aṭṭhamako aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikaroti, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāveti. Aṭṭhamakañca arahantañca ṭhapetvā avasesā puggalā aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikaronti anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāventi. (Anaññātaññassāmītindriyamūlakaṃ.)

ya10.3.1:59.1.pli: Yo aññindriyaṃ na bhāveti so aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarotīti?

ya10.3.1:60.1.pli: Yo aggaphalaṃ sacchikaroti so aññindriyaṃ na bhāveti, no ca aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikaroti. Tayo maggasamaṅgino ca arahantañca ṭhapetvā avasesā puggalā aññindriyañca na bhāventi aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikaronti.

ya10.3.1:61.1.pli: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikaroti so aññindriyaṃ na bhāvetīti?

ya10.3.1:62.1.pli: Tayo maggasamaṅgino aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikaronti, no ca aññindriyaṃ na bhāventi. Tayo maggasamaṅgino ca arahantañca ṭhapetvā avasesā puggalā aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikaronti aññindriyañca na bhāventi. (Aññindriyamūlakaṃ.)

ya10.3.2:1.1.pli: Yo cakkhundriyaṃ parijānittha so domanassindriyaṃ pajahitthāti? Āmantā.

ya10.3.2:2.1.pli: Yo vā pana domanassindriyaṃ pajahittha so cakkhundriyaṃ parijānitthāti?

ya10.3.2:3.1.pli: Dve puggalā domanassindriyaṃ pajahittha, no ca cakkhundriyaṃ parijānittha. Arahā domanassindriyañca pajahittha cakkhundriyañca parijānittha.

ya10.3.2:4.1.pli: Yo cakkhundriyaṃ parijānittha so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvitthāti? Āmantā.

ya10.3.2:5.1.pli: Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvittha so cakkhundriyaṃ parijānitthāti?

ya10.3.2:6.1.pli: Cha puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvittha, no ca cakkhundriyaṃ parijānittha. Arahā anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca bhāvittha cakkhundriyañca parijānittha.

ya10.3.2:7.1.pli: Yo cakkhundriyaṃ parijānittha so aññindriyaṃ bhāvitthāti? Āmantā.

ya10.3.2:8.1.pli: Yo vā pana aññindriyaṃ bhāvittha so cakkhundriyaṃ parijānitthāti? Āmantā.

ya10.3.2:9.1.pli: Yo cakkhundriyaṃ parijānittha so aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikaritthāti?

ya10.3.2:10.1.pli: Yo aggaphalaṃ sacchikaroti so cakkhundriyaṃ parijānittha, no ca aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarittha. Yo aggaphalaṃ sacchākāsi so cakkhundriyañca parijānittha aññātāvindriyañca sacchikarittha.

ya10.3.2:11.1.pli: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarittha so cakkhundriyaṃ parijānitthāti? Āmantā. (Cakkhundriyamūlakaṃ.)

ya10.3.2:12.1.pli: Yo domanassindriyaṃ pajahittha so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvitthāti? Āmantā.

ya10.3.2:13.1.pli: Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvittha so domanassindriyaṃ pajahitthāti?

ya10.3.2:14.1.pli: Cattāro puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvittha, no ca domanassindriyaṃ pajahittha. Tayo puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca bhāvittha domanassindriyañca pajahittha.

ya10.3.2:15.1.pli: Yo domanassindriyaṃ pajahittha so aññindriyaṃ bhāvitthāti?

ya10.3.2:16.1.pli: Dve puggalā domanassindriyaṃ pajahittha, no ca aññindriyaṃ bhāvittha. Arahā domanassindriyañca pajahittha aññindriyañca bhāvittha.

ya10.3.2:17.1.pli: Yo vā pana aññindriyaṃ bhāvittha so domanassindriyaṃ pajahitthāti? Āmantā.

ya10.3.2:18.1.pli: Yo domanassindriyaṃ pajahittha so aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikaritthāti?

ya10.3.2:19.1.pli: Tayo puggalā domanassindriyaṃ pajahittha, no ca aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarittha. Arahā domanassindriyañca pajahittha aññātāvindriyañca sacchikarittha.

ya10.3.2:20.1.pli: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarittha so domanassindriyaṃ pajahitthāti? Āmantā. (Domanassindriyamūlakaṃ.)

ya10.3.2:21.1.pli: Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvittha so aññindriyaṃ bhāvitthāti?

ya10.3.2:22.1.pli: Cha puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvittha, no ca aññindriyaṃ bhāvittha. Arahā anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca bhāvittha aññindriyañca bhāvittha.

ya10.3.2:23.1.pli: Yo vā pana aññindriyaṃ bhāvittha so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvitthāti? Āmantā.

ya10.3.2:24.1.pli: Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvittha so aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikaritthāti?

ya10.3.2:25.1.pli: Satta puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvittha, no ca aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarittha. Arahā anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca bhāvittha aññātāvindriyañca sacchikarittha.

ya10.3.2:26.1.pli: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarittha so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvitthāti? Āmantā. (Anaññātaññassāmītindriyamūlakaṃ.)

ya10.3.2:27.1.pli: Yo aññindriyaṃ bhāvittha so aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikaritthāti?

ya10.3.2:28.1.pli: Yo aggaphalaṃ sacchikaroti so aññindriyaṃ bhāvittha, no ca aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarittha. Yo aggaphalaṃ sacchākāsi so aññindriyañca bhāvittha aññātāvindriyañca sacchikarittha.

ya10.3.2:29.1.pli: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarittha so aññindriyaṃ bhāvitthāti? Āmantā. (Aññindriyamūlakaṃ.)

ya10.3.2:30.1.pli: Yo cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānittha so domanassindriyaṃ nappajahitthāti?

ya10.3.2:31.1.pli: Dve puggalā cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānittha, no ca domanassindriyaṃ nappajahittha. Cha puggalā cakkhundriyañca na parijānittha domanassindriyañca nappajahittha.

ya10.3.2:32.1.pli: Yo vā pana domanassindriyaṃ nappajahittha so cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānitthāti? Āmantā.

ya10.3.2:33.1.pli: Yo cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānittha so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvitthāti?

ya10.3.2:34.1.pli: Cha puggalā cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānittha, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvittha. Dve puggalā cakkhundriyañca na parijānittha anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvittha.

ya10.3.2:35.1.pli: Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvittha so cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānitthāti? Āmantā.

ya10.3.2:36.1.pli: Yo cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānittha so aññindriyaṃ na bhāvitthāti? Āmantā.

ya10.3.2:37.1.pli: Yo vā pana aññindriyaṃ na bhāvittha so cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānitthāti? Āmantā.

ya10.3.2:38.1.pli: Yo cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānittha so aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikaritthāti? Āmantā.

ya10.3.2:39.1.pli: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarittha so cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānitthāti?

ya10.3.2:40.1.pli: Yo aggaphalaṃ sacchikaroti so aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarittha, no ca cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānittha. Aṭṭha puggalā aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarittha cakkhundriyañca na parijānittha. (Cakkhundriyamūlakaṃ.)

ya10.3.2:41.1.pli: Yo domanassindriyaṃ nappajahittha so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvitthāti?

ya10.3.2:42.1.pli: Cattāro puggalā domanassindriyaṃ nappajahittha, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvittha. Dve puggalā domanassindriyañca nappajahittha anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvittha.

ya10.3.2:43.1.pli: Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvittha so domanassindriyaṃ nappajahitthāti? Āmantā.

ya10.3.2:44.1.pli: Yo domanassindriyaṃ nappajahittha so aññindriyaṃ na bhāvitthāti? Āmantā.

ya10.3.2:45.1.pli: Yo vā pana aññindriyaṃ na bhāvittha so domanassindriyaṃ nappajahitthāti?

ya10.3.2:46.1.pli: Dve puggalā aññindriyaṃ na bhāvittha, no ca domanassindriyaṃ nappajahittha. Cha puggalā aññindriyañca na bhāvittha domanassindriyañca nappajahittha.

ya10.3.2:47.1.pli: Yo domanassindriyaṃ nappajahittha so aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikaritthāti? Āmantā.

ya10.3.2:48.1.pli: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarittha so domanassindriyaṃ nappajahitthāti?

ya10.3.2:49.1.pli: Tayo puggalā aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarittha, no ca domanassindriyaṃ nappajahittha. Cha puggalā aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarittha domanassindriyañca nappajahittha. (Domanassindriyamūlakaṃ.)

ya10.3.2:50.1.pli: Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvittha so aññindriyaṃ na bhāvitthāti? Āmantā.

ya10.3.2:51.1.pli: Yo vā pana aññindriyaṃ na bhāvittha so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvitthāti?

ya10.3.2:52.1.pli: Cha puggalā aññindriyaṃ na bhāvittha, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvittha. Dve puggalā aññindriyañca na bhāvittha anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvittha.

ya10.3.2:53.1.pli: Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvittha so aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikaritthāti? Āmantā.

ya10.3.2:54.1.pli: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarittha so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvitthāti?

ya10.3.2:55.1.pli: Satta puggalā aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarittha, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvittha. Dve puggalā aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarittha anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvittha. (Anaññātaññassāmītindriyamūlakaṃ.)

ya10.3.2:56.1.pli: Yo aññindriyaṃ na bhāvittha so aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikaritthāti? Āmantā.

ya10.3.2:57.1.pli: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarittha so aññindriyaṃ na bhāvitthāti?

ya10.3.2:58.1.pli: Yo aggaphalaṃ sacchikaroti so aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarittha, no ca aññindriyaṃ na bhāvittha. Aṭṭha puggalā aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarittha aññindriyañca na bhāvittha. (Aññindriyamūlakaṃ.)

ya10.3.3:1.1.pli: Yo cakkhundriyaṃ parijānissati so domanassindriyaṃ pajahissatīti?

ya10.3.3:2.1.pli: Dve puggalā cakkhundriyaṃ parijānissanti, no ca domanassindriyaṃ pajahissanti. Pañca puggalā cakkhundriyañca parijānissanti domanassindriyañca pajahissanti.

ya10.3.3:3.1.pli: Yo vā pana domanassindriyaṃ pajahissati so cakkhundriyaṃ parijānissatīti? Āmantā.

ya10.3.3:4.1.pli: Yo cakkhundriyaṃ parijānissati so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvessatīti?

ya10.3.3:5.1.pli: Cha puggalā cakkhundriyaṃ parijānissanti, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvessanti. Ye puthujjanā maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti te cakkhundriyañca parijānissanti anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca bhāvessanti.

ya10.3.3:6.1.pli: Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvessati so cakkhundriyaṃ parijānissatīti? Āmantā.

ya10.3.3:7.1.pli: Yo cakkhundriyaṃ parijānissati so aññindriyaṃ bhāvessatīti? Āmantā.

ya10.3.3:8.1.pli: Yo vā pana aññindriyaṃ bhāvessati so cakkhundriyaṃ parijānissatīti? Āmantā.

ya10.3.3:9.1.pli: Yo cakkhundriyaṃ parijānissati so aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarissatīti? Āmantā.

ya10.3.3:10.1.pli: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarissati so cakkhundriyaṃ parijānissatīti?

ya10.3.3:11.1.pli: Aggamaggasamaṅgī aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarissati, no ca cakkhundriyaṃ parijānissati. Satta puggalā aññātāvindriyañca sacchikarissanti cakkhundriyañca parijānissanti. (Cakkhundriyamūlakaṃ.)

ya10.3.3:12.1.pli: Yo domanassindriyaṃ pajahissati so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvessatīti?

ya10.3.3:13.1.pli: Cattāro puggalā domanassindriyaṃ pajahissanti, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvessanti. Ye puthujjanā maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti te domanassindriyañca pajahissanti anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca bhāvessanti.

ya10.3.3:14.1.pli: Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvessati so domanassindriyaṃ pajahissatīti? Āmantā.

ya10.3.3:15.1.pli: Yo domanassindriyaṃ pajahissati so aññindriyaṃ bhāvessatīti? Āmantā.

ya10.3.3:16.1.pli: Yo vā pana aññindriyaṃ bhāvessati so domanassindriyaṃ pajahissatīti?

ya10.3.3:17.1.pli: Dve puggalā aññindriyaṃ bhāvessanti no ca domanassindriyaṃ pajahissanti, pañca puggalā aññindriyañca bhavissanti domanassindriyañca pajahissanti.

ya10.3.3:18.1.pli: Yo domanassindriyaṃ pajahissati so aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarissatīti? Āmantā.

ya10.3.3:19.1.pli: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarissati so domanassindriyaṃ pajahissatīti?

ya10.3.3:20.1.pli: Tayo puggalā aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarissanti, no ca domanassindriyaṃ pajahissanti. Pañca puggalā aññātāvindriyañca sacchikarissanti domanassindriyañca pajahissanti. (Domanassindriyamūlakaṃ.)

ya10.3.3:21.1.pli: Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvessati so aññindriyaṃ bhāvessatīti? Āmantā.

ya10.3.3:22.1.pli: Yo vā pana aññindriyaṃ bhāvessati so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvessatīti?

ya10.3.3:23.1.pli: Cha puggalā aññindriyaṃ bhāvessanti, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvessanti. Ye puthujjanā maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti te aññindriyañca bhāvessanti anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca bhāvessanti.

ya10.3.3:24.1.pli: Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvessati so aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarissatīti? Āmantā.

ya10.3.3:26.1.pli: Satta puggalā aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarissanti, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvessanti. Ye puthujjanā maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti te aññātāvindriyañca sacchikarissanti anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca bhāvessanti. (Anaññātaññassāmītindriyamūlakaṃ.)

ya10.3.3:29.1.pli: Aggamaggasamaṅgī aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarissati, no ca aññindriyaṃ bhāvessati. Satta puggalā aññātāvindriyañca sacchikarissanti aññindriyañca bhāvessanti. (Aññindriyamūlakaṃ.)

ya10.3.3:30.1.pli: Yo cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānissati so domanassindriyaṃ nappajahissatīti? Āmantā.

ya10.3.3:31.1.pli: Yo vā pana domanassindriyaṃ nappajahissati so cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānissatīti?

ya10.3.3:32.1.pli: Dve puggalā domanassindriyaṃ nappajahissanti, no ca cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānissanti. Tayo puggalā domanassindriyañca nappajahissanti cakkhundriyañca na parijānissanti.

ya10.3.4:1.1.pli: Yo cakkhundriyaṃ parijānāti so domanassindriyaṃ pajahitthāti? Āmantā.

ya10.3.4:40.1.pli: Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvittha so domanassindriyaṃ nappajahatīti? Āmantā.

ya10.3.4:41.1.pli: Yo domanassindriyaṃ nappajahati so aññindriyaṃ na bhāvitthāti?

ya10.3.4:42.1.pli: Arahā domanassindriyaṃ nappajahati, no ca aññindriyaṃ na bhāvittha. Satta puggalā domanassindriyañca nappajahanti aññindriyañca na bhāvittha.

ya10.3.4:43.1.pli: Yo vā pana aññindriyaṃ na bhāvittha so domanassindriyaṃ nappajahatīti?

ya10.3.4:44.1.pli: Anāgāmimaggasamaṅgī aññindriyaṃ na bhāvittha, no ca domanassindriyaṃ nappajahati. Satta puggalā aññindriyañca na bhāvittha domanassindriyañca nappajahanti.

ya10.3.4:45.1.pli: Yo domanassindriyaṃ nappajahati so aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikaritthāti?

ya10.3.4:46.1.pli: Arahā domanassindriyaṃ nappajahati, no ca aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarittha. Aṭṭha puggalā domanassindriyañca nappajahanti aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarittha.

ya10.3.4:47.1.pli: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarittha so domanassindriyaṃ nappajahatīti?

ya10.3.4:48.1.pli: Anāgāmimaggasamaṅgī aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarittha, no ca domanassindriyaṃ nappajahati. Aṭṭha puggalā aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarittha domanassindriyañca nappajahanti. (Domanassindriyamūlakaṃ.)

ya10.3.4:49.1.pli: Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāveti so aññindriyaṃ na bhāvitthāti?

ya10.3.4:50.1.pli: Arahā anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāveti, no ca aññindriyaṃ na bhāvittha. Satta puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāventi aññindriyañca na bhāvittha.

ya10.3.4:51.1.pli: Yo vā pana aññindriyaṃ na bhāvittha so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvetīti?

ya10.3.4:52.1.pli: Aṭṭhamako aññindriyaṃ na bhāvittha, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāveti. Satta puggalā aññindriyañca na bhāvittha anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāventi.

ya10.3.4:53.1.pli: Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāveti so aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikaritthāti?

ya10.3.4:54.1.pli: Arahā anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāveti, no ca aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarittha. Aṭṭha puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāventi aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarittha.

ya10.3.4:55.1.pli: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarittha so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvetīti?

ya10.3.4:56.1.pli: Aṭṭhamako aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarittha, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāveti. Aṭṭha puggalā aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarittha anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāventi. (Anaññātaññassāmītindriyamūlakaṃ.)

ya10.3.4:57.1.pli: Yo aññindriyaṃ na bhāveti so aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikaritthāti?

ya10.3.4:58.1.pli: Arahā aññindriyaṃ na bhāveti, no ca aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarittha. Cha puggalā aññindriyañca na bhāventi aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarittha.

ya10.3.4:59.1.pli: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarittha so aññindriyaṃ na bhāvetīti?

ya10.3.4:60.1.pli: Tayo maggasamaṅgino aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarittha, no ca aññindriyaṃ na bhāventi. Cha puggalā aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarittha aññindriyañca na bhāventi. (Aññindriyamūlakaṃ.)
